description: Support Node Exporter v0.16 and above.Optimize the main metrics display. Includes: CPU, memory, disk IO, network, temperature and other monitoring metrics。https://github.com/starsliao/Prometheus

matcher.options: Idle - Waiting for something to happen
Idle - Waiting for something to happen

panels.description: Read/write completions per second aggregated on on all devices of host
panels.title: Disk IOps Completed

targets.legendFormat: avearge across all core of an instance

panels.description: This scrape duration must be lower than the scrape_interval configured on prometheus scraper
panels.title: Scrape Time node-exporter

matcher.options: Idle - Waiting for something to happen

targets.legendFormat: {{node}} Time offset in between local system and reference clock

panels.description:
TCP_alloc - Allocated sockets

CurrEstab - TCP connections for which the current state is either ESTABLISHED or CLOSE- WAIT

TCP_tw - Sockets wating close

UDP_inuse - Udp sockets currently in use

Sockets_used - Sockets currently in use
panels.title: Network Sockstat

matcher.options: Idle - Waiting for something to happen
Hardware Corrupted - Amount of RAM that the kernel identified as corrupted / not working
Pgfault - Page major and minor fault operations

targets.legendFormat: Pgfault - Page major and minor fault operations

panels.description: Stacked values for display, but collectors are queried concurrently
panels.title: Node Exporter Scrape Time
Hardware Temperature(VM may not display the metrics)

list.description: only for information, not for selection

title: Node Exporter
